message: Let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $70, you get $30. It's in your best interest to accept quickly, as the money loses value fast for you!
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. How about something closer to the middle? Time is running out!
I understand you want something closer to the middle, but I need to be mindful of the inflation. This is my final offer.
Okay, Alice, let's be realistic. I'm willing to meet you closer to your offer, but 35 is simply too low for me. This is my final offer.
